means: 围绕( encompass的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: His repertoire encompassed everything from Bach to Schoenberg.
sentence.Network_cn: 他能演奏从巴赫到勋伯格的所有作品。

sentence.Network_en: His career spanned some 50 years and encompassed both abstract and figurative painting.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的职业生涯延续了大约50年，作品既有抽象画也有写实画。

entry.def: If something encompasses particular things, it includes them.

example.ex: ...the extra services, which start next September and encompass a wide range of special interests...
example.tran: 将从明年9月开始并涵盖各种特殊需求的额外服务

example.ex: His repertoire encompassed everything from Bach to Schoenberg.
example.tran: 他能演奏从巴赫到勋伯格的所有作品。

entry.def: To encompass a place means to completely surround or cover it.

example.ex: Encompassing over a million square miles, this remote and mountainous domain presides over the rest of Asia...
example.tran: 这片偏远多山的疆土位于亚洲大陆，占地超过100万平方英里。

example.ex: The map shows the rest of the western region, encompassing nine states.
example.tran: 地图上显示了西部地区的其他部分，包括9个州。

auth_sentence.content: Fathi encompassed the table with a sweep of his hand.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fathi encompassed the table with a sweep of his hand.

auth_sentence.content: His throne was encompassed with domestic enemies.
auth_sentence.res_content: His throne was encompassed with domestic enemies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His throne was encompassed with domestic enemies.

auth_sentence.content: Their musical style encompassed the roots rock and swamp rock genres.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their musical style encompassed the roots rock and swamp rock genres.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their musical style encompassed the roots rock and swamp rock genres.
